body.description: Only Playtex Sport Tampons have a 360° design and FlexFit technology that moves the way you move. Playtex Sport Tampons are great tampons for swimming, biking, running or whatever your activity of choice is. Playtex Sport Tampons Unscented, feature 360 SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION tampon designed to fit your body and its every move for a protective leakage barrier. with unique FLEXFIT interlocking FIBERS Playtex Sport tampons work quickly to TRAP LEAKS. The contoured applicator of Playtex Sport Tampons allow for COMFORTABLE, precise placement. Playtex Sport Tampons Unscented Super Plus Absorbency, keeping you protected throughout your period. Playtex Sport Tampons - PLAY ON!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Performance Period Gear Our 360° FlexFit design expands to fit your body and move with you - so your period can't slow you down.

Protection For Bodies In Motion 360° Triple Layer Protection Our 360° design expands to fit you from all angles with backup layers for added protection. Leak-Trapping Flexfit Technology FlexFit interlocking fibers move with you and quickly trap leaks. Comfortable Contoured Applicator With a slimmed tip and no-slip grip, our contoured applicator is designed for comfortable, precise placement.

Playtex Sport Playtex Sport Odor Shield Playtex Sport Compact Description: 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION designed to fit and adjust to your body with every move for powerful leak protection. 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION Designed with Odor Shield technology to neutralize odors for ultimate freshness. 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION Designed to comfortably fit your active life and fits in the palm of your hand. Technology: Flex Fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection Contoured Tip & No-Slip Grip Applicator For comfortable, precise placement. Odor Shield technology neutralizes odors. Up to 2x more odor fighting protection vs. Playtex Sport Flex Fit Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection Contoured Tip & No- Slip Grip Applicator for comfortable, precise placement. Designed with Compact Applicator. Pull and Click into Place. 30% Smaller than full-size tampons *based on length before extension Flex Fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection. Absorbency: Regular, Super, Super Plus, Ultra Regular, Super Regular, Super Scent: Unscented Unscented Unscented

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good alternative to her regular brand
reviews.reviewText: Got these for my partner who normally uses another brand. She was a bit skeptic at first but gave them a try mainly based on the packaging and how it's marketed as a 'sport' tampon. She found them easy to use and comfortable. Both in normal day to day activities as well as more active ones like going to the gym. She still prefers her other brand overall as it's what she's always used but found these to be well worth using and comfortable. No issues with leaks at all and the value for how much you get seems to be very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: Fits great and has great absorption, especially for my workout days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I expected
reviews.reviewText: If you know you're going to need tampons for the next several years, why not buy them in bulk? These are a great choice for that, because they're reliable and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Particularly well suited for physically active and sports oriented women.
reviews.reviewText: This review is based on reporting by my daughter since she is the one I bought these for. The following is her report:"As a runner I always look for a comfortable barrier that protects from leakage and doesn't feel like its falling out half way through my runs. The Sport is perfect for my moving body and after 2 hours of running on a heavy flow day, I don't feel like the cork is about to pop out. The 360 protection is definitely different from a traditional horizontal protection and that design is what makes it more comfortable and stay in one place."In summary, she is of the opinion that these tampons really do what they claim to do and offer a level of comfort and protection during sports and physical activities that are unique and superior to what is provided by traditional barriers. She told me to give this product 5 stars, which I have done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do the job
reviews.reviewText: I’m not really sure what to say but that these are pretty absorbent.The applicator isn’t too big and easy to use.And this set will definitely last me quite some time.10/10 would recommend to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great tampons, I always use playtex. They absorb well and go in comfortably. My only issue was I ordered super tampons and received regular.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as expected
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and works as expected. No leaks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: My wife has used these tampons and said they work very well. They are relatively comfortable and highly absorbent. Very good tampons and very decent price.
